sections.heading: on dividends.A title insurer shall only declare or distribute a dividend to shareholders without the prior written approval of the director as would be permitted under section 44-2134 for insurers other than life insurers

sections.text:
44-1990.Restrictions on dividends.

A title insurer shall only declare or distribute a dividend to shareholders without the prior written approval of the director as would be permitted under section 44-2134 for insurers other than life insurers.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 53, ยง 13.
